text:
Question 79) Several methods are used to prevent microorganism infections. Two of these methods use living microorganisms and they are: attenuated vaccines, consisting of avirulent pathogens, and the probiotics that contain beneficial bacteria. In the figure, five different mechanisms of exclusion of pathogens are presented by the action of probiotics in the intestines of an animal.
What mechanism of action of these probiotics promotes an effect similar to that of the vaccine?
A) 5
B) 4
C) 3
D) 2
E) 1
